name: ai-publish
description: AI-assisted release authoring tool that generates a changelog, release notes, and a next version number (evidence-backed from git diff).
author: Emil MÃ¼ller

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && node dist/cli.js prepublish --llm azure
scripts.test:llm-eval: node -e "process.env.AI_PUBLISH_LLM_EVAL='1'; delete process.env.CI; const { spawnSync } = require('node:child_process'); const r = spawnSync(process.execPath, ['./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs','run','test/integration-changelog-llm-eval.test.ts','test/integration-release-notes-llm-eval.test.ts','test/integration-version-bump-llm-eval.test.ts'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(r.status ?? 1)"
scripts.test:llm-generate: node -e "process.env.AI_PUBLISH_LLM_GENERATE='1'; delete process.env.CI; const { spawnSync } = require('node:child_process'); const r = spawnSync(process.execPath, ['./node_modules/vitest/vitest.mjs','run','test/integration-changelog-azure-generate.test.ts','test/integration-changelog-azure-breaking-via-context.test.ts','test/integration-release-notes-azure-generate.test.ts','test/integration-version-bump-azure-generate.test.ts','test/integration-version-bump-azure-quality.test.ts'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(r.status ?? 1)"
